typeDescription.name: Types.TestElement.Question
typeDescription.description: Question being asked in sample information processing task.

typeDescription.name: Types.TestElement.Answer
typeDescription.description: Proposed answer to question being asked in sample information processing task.

featureDescription.name: IsCorrect
featureDescription.description: Boolean Flag indicating whether or not the proposed answer is correct.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: Answer score (assigned using Gold Answer Scoring System).

typeDescription.name: Types.Processed.QAToken
typeDescription.description: Token in question/answer (delimited by whitespace and punctuation).

featureDescription.name: sentenceIndex
featureDescription.description: Unique number assigned to each sentence to allow token to determine which sentence it is part of.

typeDescription.name: Types.Processed.NGram
typeDescription.description: Type representing unigram, bigram or trigram in question/answer.

featureDescription.name: elementType
featureDescription.description: Type of the Objects stored in 'elements' array.

typeDescription.name: Types.BaseAnnotation
typeDescription.description: Common core attributes shared by all types.

featureDescription.name: confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence of the creator in the correctness of the output on a scale of 0 to 1.0.

typeDescription.name: Types.Processed.Evaluation
typeDescription.description: Evaluation of the answers to the question.

featureDescription.name: SortedAnswers
featureDescription.description: Answers sorted according to their scores.

featureDescription.name: Precision
featureDescription.description: Average Precision of the answers to the question (#correct / #predicted).
